entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Qu'Appelle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -25.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Indian Head AAFC 3:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -25.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -28.9°C
Wind: WNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening then snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
